5#ifndef V8_COMPILER_REPRESENTATION_CHANGE_H_
6#define V8_COMPILER_REPRESENTATION_CHANGE_H_
7
8#include "src/compiler/feedback-source.h"
9#include "src/compiler/js-graph.h"
10#include "src/compiler/simplified-operator.h"
11#include "src/compiler/use-info.h"
12
13namespace v8 {
14namespace internal {
15namespace compiler {
16
17// Foward declarations.
18class SimplifiedLoweringVerifier;
19class TypeCache;
20
21// Contains logic related to changing the representation of values for constants
22// and other nodes, as well as lowering Simplified->Machine operators.
23// Eagerly folds any representation changes for constants.
24class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE RepresentationChanger final {
25 public:
26 RepresentationChanger(JSGraph* jsgraph, JSHeapBroker* broker,
27 SimplifiedLoweringVerifier* verifier);
28
29 // Changes representation from {output_type} to {use_rep}. The {truncation}
30 // parameter is only used for checking - if the changer cannot figure
31 // out signedness for the word32->float64 conversion, then we check that the
32 // uses truncate to word32 (so they do not care about signedness).
33 Node* GetRepresentationFor(Node* node, MachineRepresentation output_rep,
34 Type output_type, Node* use_node,
35 UseInfo use_info);
36 const Operator* Int32OperatorFor(IrOpcode::Value opcode);
37 const Operator* Int32OverflowOperatorFor(IrOpcode::Value opcode);
38 const Operator* Int64OperatorFor(IrOpcode::Value opcode);
39 const Operator* Int64OverflowOperatorFor(IrOpcode::Value opcode);
40 const Operator* BigIntOperatorFor(IrOpcode::Value opcode);
41 const Operator* TaggedSignedOperatorFor(IrOpcode::Value opcode);
42 const Operator* Uint32OperatorFor(IrOpcode::Value opcode);
43 const Operator* Uint32OverflowOperatorFor(IrOpcode::Value opcode);
44 const Operator* Float64OperatorFor(IrOpcode::Value opcode);
45
46 MachineType TypeForBasePointer(const FieldAccess& access) {
47 return access.tag() != 0 ? MachineType::AnyTagged()
48 : MachineType::Pointer();
49 }
50
51 MachineType TypeForBasePointer(const ElementAccess& access) {
52 return access.tag() != 0 ? MachineType::AnyTagged()
53 : MachineType::Pointer();
54 }
55
56 bool verification_enabled() const { return verifier_ != nullptr; }
57
58 private:
59 TypeCache const* cache_;
60 JSGraph* jsgraph_;
61 JSHeapBroker* broker_;
62 SimplifiedLoweringVerifier* verifier_;
63
64 friend class RepresentationChangerTester; // accesses the below fields.
65
66 bool testing_type_errors_; // If {true}, don't abort on a type error.
67 bool type_error_; // Set when a type error is detected.
68
69 Node* GetTaggedSignedRepresentationFor(Node* node,
70 MachineRepresentation output_rep,
71 Type output_type, Node* use_node,
72 UseInfo use_info);
73 Node* GetTaggedPointerRepresentationFor(Node* node,
74 MachineRepresentation output_rep,
75 Type output_type, Node* use_node,
76 UseInfo use_info);
77 Node* GetTaggedRepresentationFor(Node* node, MachineRepresentation output_rep,
78 Type output_type, Truncation truncation);
79 Node* GetFloat32RepresentationFor(Node* node,
80 MachineRepresentation output_rep,
81 Type output_type, Truncation truncation);
82 Node* GetFloat64RepresentationFor(Node* node,
83 MachineRepresentation output_rep,
84 Type output_type, Node* use_node,
85 UseInfo use_info);
86 Node* GetWord32RepresentationFor(Node* node, MachineRepresentation output_rep,
87 Type output_type, Node* use_node,
88 UseInfo use_info);
89 Node* GetBitRepresentationFor(Node* node, MachineRepresentation output_rep,
90 Type output_type);
91 Node* GetWord64RepresentationFor(Node* node, MachineRepresentation output_rep,
92 Type output_type, Node* use_node,
93 UseInfo use_info);
94 Node* TypeError(Node* node, MachineRepresentation output_rep,
95 Type output_type, MachineRepresentation use);
96 Node* MakeTruncatedInt32Constant(double value);
97 Node* InsertChangeBitToTagged(Node* node);
98 Node* InsertChangeFloat32ToFloat64(Node* node);
99 Node* InsertChangeFloat64ToInt32(Node* node);
100 Node* InsertChangeFloat64ToUint32(Node* node);
101 Node* InsertChangeInt32ToFloat64(Node* node);
102 Node* InsertChangeTaggedSignedToInt32(Node* node);
103 Node* InsertChangeTaggedToFloat64(Node* node);
104 Node* InsertChangeUint32ToFloat64(Node* node);
105 Node* InsertCheckedFloat64ToInt32(Node* node, CheckForMinusZeroMode check,
106 const FeedbackSource& feedback,
107 Node* use_node);
108 Node* InsertConversion(Node* node, const Operator* op, Node* use_node);
109 Node* InsertTruncateInt64ToInt32(Node* node);
110 Node* InsertUnconditionalDeopt(Node* node, DeoptimizeReason reason,
111 const FeedbackSource& feedback = {});
112 Node* InsertTypeOverrideForVerifier(const Type& type, Node* node);
113
114 JSGraph* jsgraph() const { return jsgraph_; }
115 Isolate* isolate() const;
116 Factory* factory() const { return isolate()->factory(); }
117 SimplifiedOperatorBuilder* simplified() { return jsgraph()->simplified(); }
118 MachineOperatorBuilder* machine() { return jsgraph()->machine(); }
119};
120
121} // namespace compiler
122} // namespace internal
123} // namespace v8
124
125#endif // V8_COMPILER_REPRESENTATION_CHANGE_H_
